verbs.description: [V: Count] out [ARG1: Devante Smith - Pelly] [ARGM-ADV: if the Washington Capitals win the Stanley Cup and are invited to the White House to celebrate with President Donald Trump] .

Count out Devante Smith - Pelly if [ARG1: the Washington Capitals] win the Stanley Cup and are [V: invited] [ARG2: to the White House] [ARGM-PRP: to celebrate with President Donald Trump] .
